programme.title: Double Face
programme.desc: Uche and Zara are a twin living two different lives, things gets worse when Uche steals from a client and Zara has to pay dearly for it.

programme.title: Husband Scarcity
programme.desc: Angelina abandons her husband and family and get married to Otunba. This will not be for long as her family comes to work in Otunbas house.

programme.title: More Than A Bond
programme.desc: The love between siblings is tried when a younger sister jokes about her hatred for her brothers wife who later lost her life during childbirth.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: All fingers point to Chris as the murderer. Umu Ofu-Obodo come to beg Kelechi. Eze Dibias curse remains an issue.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Ojoma makes an interesting confession to Chris and Muna finds that his love life might soon mirror his fathers.

programme.title: One Heart
programme.desc: Ikemefuna is shocked when Mmachi turns down his marriage proposal publicly, this raised up many questions. Ikemefuna later finds out that she is suffering from a deadly illness.

programme.title: Away
programme.desc: Lanre tolerated Claras excesses for years because of their loving daughter, but everything soon crumbles as she meets Jason who eventually ruins her life.

programme.title: Kenyagi
programme.desc: Bouba abandons all his children because they are all girls, as things evolve, he sees the strength in them and fights to have them back.

programme.title: Mortuary Attendant
programme.desc: Emenike, a young graduate who is in search of a job but is left with no other option than to work as a mortuary attendant. It seems a new chapter of his life is about to begin.

programme.title: Lagos Life
programme.desc: Faith regrets having a son, she tries abandoning him but later finds a friend in the city that makes her sell him. Everything seems fine with her until his father shows up.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna and Nnannas family reunion goes unnoticed, Ejike is attacked, and Akuada experiences final heartbreak.

programme.title: Built For Ruin
programme.desc: Ivys reckless life ends in prison, but Grace and Johnson help her find redemption. From disgrace to grace, she rises again.

programme.title: Against Tradition
programme.desc: Prince Nnamdi discovers that the woman he has been dating belongs to the Osu caste. Despite this revelation, he intends to marry her.

programme.title: Crazy Neighbour
programme.desc: Amidst escalating tension between neighbors, their lives are turned upside down when their landlords drastic decision forces them to confront their differences.

programme.title: The Crash
programme.desc: Scarlets love life changed for good after a plane crash that takes her face, and she has to undergo a plastic surgery. This shocks her husband Nater as he questions her new identity.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Munas beloved is faced with harsh realities in the wake of her failure. Foreign juju to the rescue.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Kelechi fortifies himself against the wrath of the spirits. A memorial is held for Ifeoma. Finally, a new masquerade emerges.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye leaves Mgberi, Adanna and Nnanna face a surprising new revelation.

programme.title: Return Match
programme.desc: Nkisi and her brother frustrates the entire compound, but everything is about to change as Panguru steps into the compound with his son to distort their plans.

programme.title: To Love A Cripple
programme.desc: When Collins falls in love with Blessing, his mother becomes so enraged, she injures Blessing and leaves her disabled. Will Collins learn the truth and help Blessing?

programme.title: Heart Of A Princess
programme.desc: Nnenna and Adaku meet the prince and he propose to Nnenna, this gets to Adaku and she decide to make money from their union blackmailing her best friend.

programme.title: Rulers Of Power
programme.desc: After a prince fights against his own sanity, he becomes well but has to pay the ultimate price if he must become king.

programme.title: Where I Belong
programme.desc: Africa Magic Epic presents a collection of epic stories that showcase the rich cultural heritage of Nigeria.

programme.title: Wicked Heart
programme.desc: Ifeoma will stop at nothing to rob Cynthia of her joy and peace, fully backed by her malevolent father. This relentless torment continued until Cynthia lost her sanity,

programme.title: When Fools Fight
programme.desc: Zik arrives in the village and show affection to all the women, including Agnes, whom everyone believes could never find a man.

programme.title: Chaos Within
programme.desc: Sandra goes against her mothers advise and invited her stepsister Oluchi into her matrimonial home, now she will lose everything to Oluchis wicked claws.

programme.title: Moment Of Grief
programme.desc: Jidena and Naza are deeply in love, but Jidena incidentally impregnates Chioma who Jidenas friend Emeka is madly in love with.

programme.title: Pregnant Orphan
programme.desc: Felix thought he can have his way by impregnating his house maid and keeps her under his roof, all things goes bad when Felix started losing all his loved ones.

programme.title: St Lucas
programme.desc: Lucas lost himself after his mother died, Ms. Sophie, his teacher is bent on making him better, but the teacher and her student ended up falling in love.

programme.title: The Johnsons
programme.desc: A family sitcom that focuses on an average family based in Lagos Nigeria, their diverse traits and how they cope with what life has to offer them.

programme.title: Billionaire Maids
programme.desc: Ike, an orphan is lucky enough to have a rich billionaire mother that comes back looking for him, but his attitude is about to change his destiny.

programme.title: Prefects
programme.desc: Fed up with bullying at Mvule High, a group of misfits come together to defy the system, discovering strength in friendship, resilience, and self-worth as they fight back.

programme.title: Prefects
programme.desc: Fed up with bullying at Mvule High, a group of misfits come together to defy the system, discovering strength in friendship, resilience, and self-worth as they fight back.

programme.title: Comedy Nites
programme.desc: Laugh after laugh, you want to take a bathroom break before we get started- Its that good. Its a half hour of side splitting Stand-up comedy from a range of comedians.

programme.title: Fate
programme.desc: Her uncle in a ruthless power grab assassinates Amys parents. As the sole survivor, she becomes the target of Gbengas relentless pursuit and hired killers to bring her down.

programme.title: Tussle
programme.desc: After a series of heartbreaks, Gloria finds love with David and plans to marry, but a shocking discovery about his connection with her estranged lover sparks a very big chaos.

programme.title: Cooking With Gamechangers
programme.desc: Top Nigerian executives and entrepreneurs vie for the Ultimate GameChanger title by preparing delicious meals for celebrity judges. The excitement is double in season 2.

programme.title: Movement Japa
programme.desc: Shina despite his predicament finds something akin to love again, and Angela will be confronted by a shocking truth.

programme.title: Movement Japa
programme.desc: Angela offers Shina, Mimi and Osas a ticket to their desperate desire but fate did not get the memo.

programme.title: InterswitchSPAK National Science...
programme.desc: An annual pan-African science competition empowers African students in STEM, welcoming participants from all schools to maximize their potential and contribute to a better Africa.

programme.title: Sakatawa
programme.desc: Saka, under pressure to seal a deal, needs info from the news. Oblivious, Tawa switches to her show. By the time she returns the remote, the crucial news is over.

programme.title: Sakatawa
programme.desc: Dedicated to African programming made by Africans, we provide family themed content comprising captivating dramas, sitcoms, shows and must watch series.

programme.title: Slum King
programme.desc: Maje learns his family history as war comes to Oro Lede in the form of Agbakara. Banjo acts on his madness and brings hell to Friday as Kate is thrown into the deep.

programme.title: The Real Housewives Of Lagos
programme.desc: Chioma sheds a tear during an emotional encounter. Iyabo calls a meeting that leaves some friendships bruised. Will there ever be a comeback?

programme.title: Kiekie Unscripted Experience
programme.desc: Kiekie hosts a lively talent show highlighting strength, academics, and creativity with challenges like singing, acting, balloon buster, and back-to-school tasks each episode.

programme.title: Tolanis Trials
programme.desc: An all-ladies retreat is disrupted by a startling revelation.This unexpected bombshell leaves them on edge, questioning what other secrets lie hidden.

programme.title: Love Unusual
programme.desc: A disgraced ex-teacher runs into the love of his life, the woman who was the reason he got sent to jail.

programme.title: Lucky Me
programme.desc: Victor is a promising young man who just never seems to make any headway with work or women. Down on his last luck, Victor sets out to turn his fortunes around.

programme.title: Jofran
programme.desc: Joseph is the perfect picture of a doting husband. Francisca was content with her man until she starts having strange dreams and Josephs buried traits are unearthed.

programme.title: Love Come Back
programme.desc: Its not easy saying Im sorry but with a beautiful surprise and help from the Love Come Back team, getting your love back might not be that hard after all.

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: The Rishantes
programme.desc: Halita faces humiliation and suffering in the kidnappers den.

programme.title: Tinsel
programme.desc: The story follows the lives, rivalries, and relationships of two film production companies, exploring power, love, and betrayal.

programme.title: Riona
programme.desc: Ofotonku reacts to Aghans challenge. Jolomi makes his decision about the call to service. Atigbi finds the rebels, and all sides continue to press forward.

programme.title: Forbidden
programme.desc: The secret affair between two lovers is exposed when the ladys colleague sends a picture of the couple making out to the blogs.

programme.title: Jofran
programme.desc: Joseph is the perfect picture of a doting husband. Francisca was content with her man until she starts having strange dreams and Josephs buried traits are unearthed.

programme.title: Date My Family Nigeria
programme.desc: A dating show that takes singles looking for love on multiple dates with family members of a possible love interest in the hopes of finding a good match for themselves.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Donatus, suspicious of Dans activities, enlists Bonquisha to covertly gather information, escalating mistrust between the two friends.

programme.title: Dust
programme.desc: Loves journey from butterflies to bitter end. A modern twist on Romeo and Juliets tale of passion turns to hate.

programme.title: Hook, Line And Sinkah
programme.desc: Ugo is alone for the weekend and decides to invite a girl over. He calls up three different girls, who are each not sure they can make it.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Years after Ezinne and Peter started EE and A, they tackle a high-profile murder case. An emotionally fragile Ugo attends therapy and Mama Ugo longs for her family.

programme.title: Stolen Life
programme.desc: A successful young man, struggling to feel attraction even to women he loved, seeks therapy to uncover the cause but unexpectedly discovers himself drawn to love.

programme.title: Unmarried
programme.desc: Three inseparable young ladies strive to survive the dynamics of friendship, career challenges, relationships, as well as general issues.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Donatus is confronted by Willy for preventing him from arresting Kiki.

programme.title: Glass House
programme.desc: Adaku dreams of settling with Emeka after NYSC. Chief Amadi offers Emeka a job, while chief Azubuike threatens him. Uju and Oscar plot, leading to Emekas death.

programme.title: Dust
programme.desc: Loves journey from butterflies to bitter end. A modern twist on Romeo and Juliets tale of passion turns to hate.

programme.title: Debbies Salon
programme.desc: A celebrity look-alike sparks chaos at the salon, Debbies romance with Bayo deepens, and Jides flashy new lifestyle leaves the staff suspicious of secrets.

programme.title: Ti-Ghana Island
programme.desc: War breaks out TI Island as the kingpin wants Alex to marry his troublesome daughter and leaves his lover. Will Alex accept the offer?

programme.title: Enakhe
programme.desc: Enakhe lays down the law for Ivie. Kevwe gets an ultimatum. Archie makes moves to secure his status.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Senami is found and comes to a decision. Akweyon tries to save her sisters life.

programme.title: The River
programme.desc: Love and blood bonds are tested when two separate worlds dramatically collide., as greed and betrayal rule the worlds of the wealthy businessmen and exploited township inhabitants.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Jite assists Frank in searching for a new car, offering guidance and support throughout the process.

programme.title: Hustle
